Pre-Game Insights: D.L. Hall gets the nod on the mound for the Milwaukee Brewers in the final of a three-game series against the Arizona Diamondbacks and Randal Grichuk on Sunday at 4:10 p.m. ET.
The Diamondbacks’ .263 batting average is second-best in MLB.
The Brewers have a team batting average of .250 this season, which ranks eighth among MLB teams.
